ðŸ“– Summary: MyDumper is a tool for creating logical backups of MySQL databases. It utilizes multithreading to achieve faster backup speeds and provides consistent snapshots. It also offers features like PCRE support for specifying database and table inclusions/exclusions and separate files for tables and metadata, making it easier to manage backups.
